[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Struct: GenesisInfo] [Voting manipulation] Can voting_duration_secs be set to an extremely short duration (e.g., 1 second), enabling governance proposal manipulation before honest validators can review and vote? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Struct: GenesisInfo] [Lockup bypass] Can recurring_lockup_duration_secs be set to 0, allowing instant stake withdrawals that undermine economic security and enable quick exit scams by validators? (High)
